verses.text: Fools say in their heart, “There is no God.” Vile, hateful their life is; not one does good.
From heaven the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*looks out on humans, to see if any are wise, and care for God.
But all have turned bad, the taint is on all; not one does good, no, not one.
Have they learned their lesson, those workers of evil? Who ate up my people, eating, devouring, never calling to the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Sore afraid will they be; for God is among those who are righteous,
you may mock the plans of the poor, but the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*is their refuge.
If only help from Zion would come for Israel! When the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*brings his people a change of fortune, how glad will be Jacob, and Israel how joyful!
